item.title: [unf] Trapeze Artist
item.description:
Creature — Human Performer

Flying

Trapeze Artist enters the battlefield by being flipped from a height of at least one foot (about 0.3 meters). If it lands face down or didn't turn over completely at least once, return it to its owner's hand.

https://www.instagram.com/p/Ci-j-39uKEL/

item.title: [unf] Spinnerette, Arachnobat
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spider Performer

Reach

When Spinnerette, Arachnobat enters the battlefield, open an Attraction.

As long as you control three or more Attractions, Spinnerette, Arachnobat gets +2/+0 and has menace.

https://twitter.com/JackTorrance90/status/1574444014870450176

item.title: [unf] Strength-Testing Hammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks, roll a six-sided die. That creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the result. Then if it has the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield, draw a card.

Equip {3}

https://twitter.com/JackTorrance90/status/1574444055781871616

item.title: [unf] Icing Manipulator
item.description:
Creature — Human Employee

Each +1/+1 counter on a creature you control is also a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

{3}{G}, {T}: Roll two six-sided dice. For each result, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature of your choice. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://www.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=458243406332415&set=a.451841636972592

item.title: [unf] Busted!
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of words in the name with the most words among permanents you control.

https://twitter.com/TheOneJame/status/1574452544260038656

item.title: [unf] Souvenir T-Shirt
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Gear Up, sponsored by Wizards of the Coast — As Souvenir T-Shirt enters the battlefield, roll two six-sided dice. For each Magic-branded Item you're wearing, roll an additional six-sided die. Choose two of those results.

Equipped creature gets +X/+Y, where X is the first chosen result and Y is the second.

Equip {4}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MjJuDrYcQAc

item.title: [unf] Pair o' Dice Lost
item.description:
Instant

Roll two six-sided dice. Return any number of cards with total mana value X or less from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the total of those results. Exile Pair o' Dice Lost.

https://twitter.com/SpellTable/status/1574457370922876929

item.title: [unf] Standard Procedure
item.description:
Instant

{1}, Reveal Standard Procedure from your hand: Choose an instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less currently legal in the Standard format. Standard Procedure becomes that card until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] Ferris Wheel
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose target creature that hasn't been phased out with Ferris Wheel. That creature phases out until you roll a 3 or less while rolling to visit your Attractions.

https://twitter.com/Sci_Phile/status/1574464953343365120

item.title: [unf] Astroquarium
item.description:
Artifact

When Astroquarium enters the battlefield, you may put an art sticker on it.

{1}, {T}: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Shark with base power and toughness 4/4. If the cracks in Astroquarium's art are completely covered, that creature becomes a blue Octopus with base power and toughness 8/8 instead. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://gizmodo.com/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-preview-interview-1849581930

item.title: [unf] Storybook Ride
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Attractions you've visited this turn (including this one). You may play those cards this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, put them on the bottom of your library in any order.

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1574522488540782592

item.title: [unf] Storybook Ride
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Attractions you've visited this turn (including this one). You may play those cards this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, put them on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [unf] Vedalken Squirrel-Whacker
item.description:
Creature — Vedalken Guest

As Vedalken Squirrel-Whacker enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die twice. Its base power becomes the first result and its base toughness becomes the second result.

If you would roll one or more six-sided dice, instead roll them and you may exchange one result with Vedalken Squirrel-Whacker's base power or base toughness.

https://gizmodo.com/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-preview-interview-1849581930

item.title: [unf] It Came from Planet Glurg
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Alien Ooze

You may have It Came from Planet Glurg enter the battlefield as a copy of X different creatures on the battlefield. (It has their total power, total toughness, combined mana costs, all text boxes, names, art, and so on.)

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen number of lines of flavor text, put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [unf] Log Flume
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit - Choose up to four creatures you control. Those creatures jump in a log until end of turn. (Creatures in a log together can't be blocked unless they're all blocked. If a spell or ability you control targets one of them, it targets all of them.

item.description:

Trample

Whenever you roll your third die each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Resolute Veggiesaur.

item.title: [sld] Olivia, Mobilized for War
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Knight

Flying

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, it gains haste until end of turn, and it becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

item.title: [unf] Haberthrasher
item.description:
Creature — Human Hatificer Assassin

Deathtouch

Whenever another creature that has a hat enters the battlefield under your control or a hat sticker is put on a creature you control, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [unf] Fight the _____ Fight
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature you control

When this Aura enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it. When you do, enchanted creature fights up to one target creature you don't control.

Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each name sticker on this Aura with eight or more letters.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OZP2d92HmXo

Whenever you roll a 1, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token.

item.title: [unf] Pick-a-Beeble
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Roll a six-sided die. Put a number of luck counters on Pick-a-Beeble equal to the result and create a Treasure token. Then if there are six or more luck counters on Pick-a-Beeble, claim the prize!

Prize — Create two Treasure tokens, then sacrifice Pick-a-Beeble and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Dee Kay, Finder of the Lost
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Employee

When Dee Kay, Finder of the Lost enters the battlefield, open an Attraction.

Whenever you roll a d2, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Whenever you roll a 4, you may tap or untap target creature.

Whenever you roll a 6, return target creature from your graveyard to your hand.

https://twitter.com/infrecuentes/status/1573638554248421377

item.title: [unf] Squirrel Squatters
item.description:
Creature — Squirrel

When Squirrel Squatters enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

Whenever Squirrel Squatters attacks, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token that's tapped and attacking for each Attraction you've visited this turn.

https://twitter.com/infrecuentes/status/1573659480449028100

item.title: [unf] Trigger Happy
item.description:
Instant

Choose a triggered ability of target permanent. It triggers. You control that ability.

item.title: [unf] Tchotchke Elemental
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Whenever you create a token or put a counter or a sticker on another permanent, put a knickknack counter on Tchotchke Elemental. Use a unique item that completely fits on Tchotchke Elemental for each knickknack counter.

Tchotchke Elemental gets +1/+1 for each knickknack counter on it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xJ3-j9UvBZs

item.title: [unf] Lineprancers
item.description:
Creature — Centaur Performers

When Lineprancers enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a power and toughness sticker on a creature you own.

{3}{G}: Target creature you don't control blocks target creature you control with a power and toughness sticker on it other than Lineprancers this turn if able.

item.title: [unf] Pie-Eating Contest
item.description:

As an additional cost to cast this spell, gobble X. (Each time you gobble, take a bit of food or sacrifice a Food token.)

X target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

As Fluros of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a number greater than 0.

Whenever you cast a spell with power, toughness, or loyalty equal to the chosen number, target artifact or creature becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness X/X, where X is chosen number.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen word in its rules text, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.

+1: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

+1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

−8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

Flash

item.title: [unf] Starlight Spectacular
item.description:
Enchantment

Parade! — At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose creatures you control one at a time until each creature you control has been chosen. Each of those creatures gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature chosen before it. (Places everyone! The first creature in line gets +0/+0.)

https://twitter.com/MagicNoobz/status/1573454130093359122

item.title: [unf] _____ Balls of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it.

Whenever you put a sticker on this enchantment, it deals damage equal to the number of o's in name stickers on this enchantment to any target.

https://twitter.com/Ruu_TV/status/1573492745452376064

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a red card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a green card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a colorless card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a blue card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a black card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [sld] Predatory Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control get +1/+1.
